UALocationProviderProtocol Protocol Reference

Conforms to NSObject
Declared in UALocationProviderProtocol.h

Overview

provider

This is a required parameter on the CLLocationManager and is presented to the user for authentication.

@property (nonatomic, copy) NSString *provider

Current status of the location provider.

Declared In

UALocationProviderProtocol.h

Instance Methods

purpose

Purpose for location services shown to user when prompted to allow location services to begin. The default value is the NSLocationUsageDescription listed in the info.plist. This value cannot be set programatically.

- (NSString *)purpose

Return Value

An NSString with the current purpose

Declared In

UALocationProviderProtocol.h

startReportingLocation

Starts updating location.

- (void)startReportingLocation

Declared In

UALocationProviderProtocol.h

stopReportingLocation

Stops providing location updates.

- (void)stopReportingLocation
